text: Spencer Davis (born Spencer David Nelson Davies, 17 July 1939 â€“ 19 October 2020) was a Welsh musician and multi-instrumentalist. He was the founder of the 1960s beat band The Spencer Davis Group. Davis died from pneumonia on 19 October 2020 in Los Angeles at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Welsh rock musicians Category:Welsh pop musicians Category:Welsh pop singers Category:British rock singers Category:British guitarists
